doc.previous: The second normal mode is  Which corresponds to both masses moving in the same direction at the same time
doc.after: This corresponds to the masses moving in the opposite directions while the center of mass remains stationary  The general solution is a superposition of the normal modes where c1 c2 1 and 2 are determined by the initial conditions of the problem
